TF094584-EASTERN NILE FIRST JOINT
            MULTIPURPOSE PROGRAM IDENTIFICATION Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Eastern Nile First
            Joint Multipurpose Program Identification (JMP1 ID) Project
            for Africa is to assist the three Eastern Nile (EN)
            countries in identification of the JMP1 investment package,
            through a series of studies and consultative activities that
            take into account economic, social and environmental
            sustainability issues in an integrated manner. The
            restructuring includes: (i) extension of the grant closing
            date from September 30, 2011 to December 31, 2012; (ii)
            revision to the project development objectives and the
            results framework to reflect recent changes in
            Ethiopia's plans for hydropower development on the
            Abbay/Blue Nile; (iii) revisions of project component costs;
            (iv) adjustments to the grant expenditure categories; and
            (iv) additional measures to reduce the risks of project
            delays and to enhance the quality of project outputs.
